nodes.documentation:
The CreditorProxy is a thin wrapper around the DebtKernel
It implements creditor-driven loans as specified by DIP-1
 * Authors: Bo Henderson <bohendo> & Shivani Gupta <shivgupt> & Dharma Team
DIP: https://github.com/dharmaprotocol/DIPs/issues/1
nodes.name: CreditorProxy

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[5] memory,uint256[4] memory,bytes32[1] memory) pure returns (bytes32)
function (address,address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory,uint8[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory) external returns (bytes32)
function (address[5] memory,uint256[4] memory,bytes32[1] memory) pure returns (bytes32)

nodes.documentation: Allows creditor to prevent a debt offer from being used in the future
nodes.name: cancelDebtOffer

nodes.documentation: Returns the messaged signed by the creditor to indicate their commitment
nodes.name: getCreditorCommitmentHash

nodes.documentation:
Assert that the creditor has a sufficient token balance and has granted the token transfer
proxy contract sufficient allowance to suffice for the principal and creditor fee.
nodes.name: hasSufficientBalanceAndAllowance

nodes.documentation:
Given a hashed message, a signer's address, and a signature,
returns whether the signature is valid.
nodes.name: isValidSignature

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (address) view external returns (uint256))

nodes.documentation: Helper function for querying an address' balance on a given token.
nodes.name: getBalance

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (address,address) view external returns (uint256))

nodes.documentation: Helper function for querying this contract's allowance for transferring the given token.
nodes.name: getAllowance

nodes.documentation: Helper function for approving this address' allowance to Dharma's token transfer proxy.
nodes.name: setTokenTransferAllowance

nodes.documentation: Helper function for transferring a specified amount of tokens between two parties.
nodes.name: transferTokensFrom

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
